title: Matching bases
text: $$\log_{10}\left(3x\right)$$ and $$\log_{10}\left(x^3\right)$$ have the same log base, so we can see it as $$x^3=64$$
speech: the log base 10 of 3 x,  and , the log base 10 of, parentheses x cubed   have the same log base, so we can see it as  x cubed is equal to 64

title: Final Answer
text: Solve for $$x^3=64$$. Given $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$, $$b$$ can not be negative.The only answer is $$x=4$$ which is positive. Therefore, $$x=4$$ is the only solution.
